<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
// ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç å‹¿åŠ¨ï¼
function atob(input) {
/*æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†by: Yoloã€‚å†™æºè§£å¯†jsä¸æ˜“ï¼Œç¦æ­¢è½¬è½½ï¼*/
  const chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/='; 
  let str = String(input).replace(/=+$/, '');
  let output = '';  
  for (let bc = 0, bs = 0, buffer, i = 0; buffer = str.charAt(i++); ~buffer && (bs = bc % 4 ? bs * 64 + buffer : buffer, bc++ % 4) ? output += String.fromCharCode(255 & bs >> (-2 * bc & 6)) : 0) {
    buffer = chars.indexOf(buffer);
  }
  return output;
}

function decodeStr(arr) {
    var result = '';
    for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        result += String.fromCharCode(arr[i]);
    }
    return decodeURIComponent(escape(result));
}

function de(str) {
    return str.split('').reverse().join('');
}

function decode(s, k, y) {
    var K = atob(k).split('').map(char => char.charCodeAt(0));
    var eK = de(K.map(char => String.fromCharCode(char)).join('')).split('').map(char => char.charCodeAt(0));
    var S = atob(y + s).split('').map(char => char.charCodeAt(0));
    var g = S.map((h, i) => h ^ eK[i % eK.length]);
    return decodeStr(g);
}

                //java.log("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¹¦åå¯¹åº”çš„ a æ ‡ç­¾");
            }            
            var authorElement = container.selectFirst("span");

                introText = introElement.text().trim();
                book.intro = introText;                 
                book.kind = null; 
                if (!introText.startsWith("ç®€ä»‹:")) {
                    var kindPrefix = "ç±»åˆ«:";
                    var kindIndex = introText.indexOf(kindPrefix);
                    if (kindIndex !== -1) {
                        var kindTemp = introText.substring(kindIndex + kindPrefix.length).trim();
                        var chapterPrefix = "æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚";

                book.intro = null; 
                book.kind = null;
                //java.log("æœªæ‰¾åˆ° intro/kind å¯¹åº”çš„ div.text_2NOr6 æ ‡ç­¾");
            }            
            var allAElements = container.select("a");
            if (allAElements.size() >= 2) {
                book.lastChapter = allAElements.get(allAElements.size() - 2).text().trim();
            } else {
                book.lastChapter = null; 
                //java.log("a æ ‡ç­¾æ•°é‡ä¸è¶³ï¼Œæ— æ³•æå–å€’æ•°ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä½œä¸º lastChapter");
            }
        } else if (container.hasClass("result")) {            
            java.log("å¤„ç†ç¬¬ " + (i + 1) + " (result)");            
            book.bookUrl = container.attr("mu") || null;            
            var nameElement = container.selectFirst("a");
            if (nameElement) {
                var nameText = nameElement.text().trim();
                book.name = (nameText) ? nameText : "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°";
                if (!nameText) {
                   //java.log("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¹¦åï¼Œa æ ‡ç­¾å†…å®¹: " + nameElement.outerHtml());
                }
            } else {
                book.name = "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°";
                //java.log("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ä¹¦åå¯¹åº”çš„ a æ ‡ç­¾");
            }            
            var contentRightElement = container.selectFirst(".content-right_1THTn");
            if (contentRightElement) {
                var fullText = contentRightElement.text().trim();
                book.intro = fullText;                 
                book.author = null; 
                var authorPrefix = "ä½œè€…:"; 
                var authorIndex = fullText.indexOf(authorPrefix);
                var kindSeparator = "ç±»åˆ«"; 
                var kindIndexForAuthor = fullText.indexOf(kindSeparator);
                if (authorIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = authorIndex + authorPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (kindIndexForAuthor !== -1 && kindIndexForAuthor > authorIndex) ? kindIndexForAuthor : fullText.length;
                    book.author = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("æœªåœ¨ .content-right_1THTn ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° 'ä½œè€…:'");
                }                
                book.kind = null; 
                var kindPrefix = "ç±»åˆ«:"; 
                var kindIndex = fullText.indexOf(kindPrefix);
                var chapterSeparator = "æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚"; 
                var chapterIndexForKind = fullText.indexOf(chapterSeparator);
                if (kindIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = kindIndex + kindPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (chapterIndexForKind !== -1 && chapterIndexForKind > kindIndex) ? chapterIndexForKind : fullText.length;
                    book.kind = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("æœªåœ¨ .content-right_1THTn ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° 'ç±»åˆ«:'");
                }                
                book.lastChapter = null; 
                var chapterPrefix = "æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚:"; 
                var chapterIndex = fullText.indexOf(chapterPrefix);
                var updateSeparator = "æœ€æ–°æ›´æ–°"; 
                var updateIndex = fullText.indexOf(updateSeparator);

                if (chapterIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = chapterIndex + chapterPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (updateIndex !== -1 && updateIndex > chapterIndex) ? updateIndex : fullText.length;
                    book.lastChapter = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("æœªåœ¨ .content-right_1THTn ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° 'æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚:'");
                }
            } else {                
                book.author = null;
                book.kind = null;
                book.lastChapter = null;
                book.intro = null;
                //java.log("æœªæ‰¾åˆ° .content-right_1THTn å…ƒç´ ");
            }
        } else {
            //java.log("è·³è¿‡æœªçŸ¥ç±»å‹çš„å®¹å™¨: " + container.outerHtml().substring(0, 100));
            continue; 
        }        
        bookList.push(book);
    }
    var finalResult = {
        bookList: bookList 
    };
    finalJsonOutput = JSON.stringify(finalResult);
} catch (e) {
    java.log("é”™è¯¯: " + e);
    finalJsonOutput = JSON.stringify({
        bookList: []
    }); 
}
result = finalJsonOutput;

// è§£æåˆ†ç±»æ•°æ®
function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// è§£ææ ‡ç­¾æ•°æ®
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=0&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// åˆ›å»º FlexBox å¯¹è±¡
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

// ç”Ÿæˆåˆ†ç±»ç»“æœ
const result = [];
result.push(createFlexBox(`ğŸ“‚ æˆ‘çš„æ”¶è—`, "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token={{source.getLoginHeaderMap().get('token')}}&order=0&classId=&backupTime={{Date.now()}}\"}", 1));

if(ShelfNum){
const ShelfNumList = String(ShelfNum).split(",");
ShelfNumList.forEach(x => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(ShelfList[x]);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});
}


authorNames.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

JSON.stringify(result);

all.forEach(item => {
  const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
});

const enabledCategoryList = enabledCategories.split(",");
enabledCategoryList.forEach(categoryIndex => {
  const categoryName = categories[categoryIndex];
  if (categoryData[categoryName]) {
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${åˆ†ç±»æ ‡è¯†} ${categoryName}è¿è½½`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].è¿è½½.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${åˆ†ç±»æ ‡è¯†} ${categoryName}å®Œç»“`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].å®Œç»“.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${æ¦œå•æ ‡è¯†} ${categoryName}æ¦œå•`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].æ¦œå•.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
  }
});

result.push(createFlexBox(`${æ ‡ç­¾æ ‡è¯†} ${tagName}æ ‡ç­¾`, null, 1));
tags.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

JSON.stringify(result);

â€”â€”â—ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼Œï¼›ï¼šã€.?!,;:ã€‹ ã€‘ï¼‰â€â€™â€¦~"')
å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯ä»¥è¿™äº›æ ‡ç‚¹ç¬¦å·ç»“å°¾ï¼Œé‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦è·Ÿç« èŠ‚åç›¸åŒäº†å°±ä¼šè¢«åˆ é™¤
*/
	function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    
    // æ£€æŸ¥ç¬¬ä¸€æ®µæ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«ç‰¹å®šå­—ç¬¦ â—
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('â—');
    
    // æ ¹æ®æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦å†³å®šå¤„ç†å“ªä¸€æ®µ
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    
    // æ£€æŸ¥ç›®æ ‡æ®µè½ç»“å°¾æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ ‡ç‚¹ç¬¦å·
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[â€”â€”â—ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼Œï¼›ï¼šã€\.\?!,;:ã€‹ ã€‘ï¼‰â€â€™â€¦~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        // åªè¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ä¸ç« èŠ‚åç›¸åŒå°±åˆ é™¤
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === 'â˜ª') continue;
                java.log("åˆ é™¤å½“å‰æ®µè½ï¼š"+targetParagraph)
                java.log("å½“å‰ç« èŠ‚åï¼š"+chapterTitle)
                java.log("ç›¸åŒæ–‡å­—ï¼š"+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}
const bbb = book.getVariable("custom");

if(/å‡€åŒ–/.test(sss)||/å‡€åŒ–/.test(bbb))result = removeDuplicatedParagraphs(result, title);

result.replace(/<br\/>/g,'\n')
</js>
